name: Arif Hossain
comment: Amazing views and a respectful local guide. Totally eco-friendly experience.

name: Fatima Noor
comment: Great wildlife spotting, comfortable boat, would love longer birdwatching time.

name: Rashed Khan
comment: Excellent instructors and strict eco rules — felt very safe and responsible.

name: Mst. Laila Begum
comment: Peaceful paddling and helpful guide. Bring insect repellent!

name: Tanvir Ahmed
comment: Beautiful night sky and well-organized clean camps — loved the beach cleanup activity.

name: Sadia Karim
comment: Challenging but rewarding. Local foods were delicious and sustainable.

name: Imran Sheikh
comment: Crystal waters were stunning. Guides enforced eco rules well.

name: Nabila Chowdhury
comment: Saw gibbons and many birds — the guide was super knowledgeable.

name: Kamal Uddin
comment: Wonderful wetlands and friendly host community. Felt eco-conscious throughout.

name: Rupa Sultana
comment: Relaxing retreat; enjoyed sunrise & sunset. Slight room improvements needed.
